p: The test cultivar utilized in the present work was Albion ( Fragaria × ananassa Duch. cv. Albion). The strawberries were taken at commercial maturity stage from a commercial greenhouse in Urmia, West Azerbaijan province, Iran. Sampling was carried out early in the morning. The fruit was selected for the similarity of size, maturity, and color, and the damaged and unshaped fruit samples were removed. The samples were then transferred in a fridge of 4 ± 1 °C to the Department of Horticulture Science of Faculty of Agriculture of Urmia University (Urmia, Iran).
